summary: A Business Administration/ICT engineer with over twenty years international experience, mainly in Africa. Specialised in analysing complex information management challenges, developing innovative technology solutions and facilitating their implementation.

It supports the public sector and international organisations globally with data solutions and digital PMEL services. For example by mapping water infrastructure in Africa to improve management and maintenance (e.g: www.pemmali.org) or monitoring smallholder farmer income. Services range from designing data strategies, providing training & support with data collection, analysis & visualisation to developing digital monitoring & evaluation platforms.
In my role as manager Mali I was responsible for Akvo’s operations in West Africa: The context was challenging due to insecurity, political instability and the Covid-19 situation. Responsibilities and tasks:
o	Leading the Bamako team that focuses on supporting the West-African public sector and international organisations with PMEL and collecting & analysing data in the fields of water, agriculture, e-government and health (Covid-19) among others (e.g. National Ministry of Water, Bamako municipality, Near East Foundation, Afdi and Unicef)
o	The Mali data initiative: A feasibility study to develop a national data exchange, enabling sharing of data between various development initiatives. This would help stakeholders in international cooperation to make better use of existing data and operate more effectively. Pilots were conducted in Mopti & Ségou (in collaboration with SNV & NEF). As programme manager I was in charge of finalising the feasibility study, establishing links with donors and involving ICT startups in Bamako.
o	Business development & donor relations: Developing new programmes and partnerships (incl. public sector involvement), writing successful proposals and managing donor relations: among others supporting agricultural programmes with PMEL and data (Near east foundation and Afdi), SIGMA database Ministry of Water (DNH) and donor relations: KFW and Unicef.', 'title': 'Regional manager West Africa, Bamako, Mali', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1473478, 'name': 'Akvo', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGAaqVbqC3A7A/company-logo_400_400/0/1551361505948?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=hVwfCDSrPLeOcMC2MawHVy5BtnBBbB9NIsJxyXjJ4HE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/akvo/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nairobi, Kenya', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Akvo', 'description': 'See general description Akvo above.
